resources.string:
Hey, my name is Adam. 

I have two kids, two cats that I'm allergic to, two lizards, and a flying squirrel. 

After getting a philosophy degree from a now defunct school, I spent years fixing mowers and other small engines. At the time I was a single dad of one and barely treading water, so I decided to get a degree some one would want. Two years later I got my Computer Science degree, an amazing wife, and a second kid.

Now I am learning kotlin app development to make up for my lack of practical experience, with the goal getting a job in app developement!
